reviews.review_msg: Loved Kolb. This class would have been impossible without her. If you have to take this class with Perkins try to get Kolb's tutorial.
This class was tough and the prof Perkins was unapproachable. Abby and Kevin (TAs) were great. They got me thru the class.
good and helpful. makes a boring topic interesting with examples from her work and research. would recommend
Abby is wonderful. Super knowledgeable and helpful and super hot!
Tough grader but super helpful. Hope to have her again.
Funny as hell. Makes it make sense with real life examples. Tough marker but fair. There for U when U need help. Hot, super smart, nice.

Abby has helped me more than any other prof or TA during my time at SFU. She met with me many times to help me understand the assignments, gave detailed feedback to help me improve, and is all around pretty darn wonderful. Great with theory and writing. Very approachable. Fair grader. I wouldn't have survived this term without her.

Abby is AMAZING! I have never had a TA dedicate so much time to helping me. She truly cares about her students and wants us to learn, and she is willing meet with us and help us. You have to do the work to succeed, but if you do the work and ask for help she will give you amazing guidance and help you. We all love her! THE BEST! Would recommend!
Abby's good and nice; Interesting person to.
so helpful. always makes time to meet with students
